hero.title:
We invite you
to our wedding
hero.subtitle: Coming soon

place.title: Where and When?
place.subtitle: A day to remember
place.text1: Join us on this special day to share laughter, tears, and unforgettable moments. Celebrate love and joy in the company of family and friends, as two hearts unite in a new adventure.
place.text2: We look forward to seeing you there to celebrate this wonderful occasion together!
place.text3: Add the wedding day to your Google calendar!
place.select: Select an address to view the location on the map.

confirm.title: Confirm your attendance
confirm.msg: Please confirm your attendance one month in advance.

itinerary.title: Itinerary
itinerary.subtitle: We are excited to share with you the details of our special day. Below, we present the itinerary so you don't miss any significant moments of this long-awaited celebration.
itinerary.text2: Enjoy drinks and appetizers with us.
itinerary.text3: Join us for a delicious dinner.
itinerary.text4: End the night dancing and celebrating with us.
